58aac890-c60e-4867-868f-775a5334e4fc.name: npmInstall.sh
58aac890-c60e-4867-868f-775a5334e4fc.description:
Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]
58aac890-c60e-4867-868f-775a5334e4fc.script:
rm -f <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh

while [ ! -f <%p.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh ]
setPromptCodes:3e 20
   do
   sleep 0.1
done
setPrompt:[SysStack]

chmod 770 <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
echo var:npmInstall:npmInstall.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save#!/bin/bash
    sleep 3
  fi
echo done

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh

file=$1

if [ ! -e "$file" ] ; then
    touch "$file"
    echo $2 >> $file
fi

if [ ! -w "$file" ] ; then
    echo cannot write to $file
    exit 1
fi

0e0c1e12-9565-447c-91c8-4d82aa7b0348.name: Hello World

ops.insert:
Builds and deploys 'Hello World' example.
Creates Project Folders.

0e0c1e12-9565-447c-91c8-4d82aa7b0348.script:
cd ~
pwd
export projectName=<%c.projectName%> 

mkdir ./projects/
mkdir projects/$projectName/
cd ./projects/$projectName/

export:projectPath:pwd

echo var:projectName:$projectName

echo var:testingHostPort:<%c.testingProt%><%s.host%>:<%c.testingPort%> 

echo var:systemUser:<%c.user%>

82acf12d-8f1d-4689-8538-b9716ac22d46.name: Node instance (helloWorld.js)
82acf12d-8f1d-4689-8538-b9716ac22d46.script:
rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
saveTemplate:<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

<%s.waitFor%> <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

export serverPath=<%p.projectPath%>
export serverPathFile=<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

echo var:serverPathFile:$serverPathFile
echo var:nodeFileName:<%c.nodeFileName%>

chmod 660 $serverPathFile

cd $serverPath
#npm install express --save
<%s.npmInstall%> express 

rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/404.html
saveTemplate:2:<%p.projectPath%>/404.html

echo 'var:add_inits:<add_inits>'
echo 'var:add_functions:<add_functions>'

8f22297e-428e-4d39-bc77-33bea93f35bc.name: re/start helloWorld.js
8f22297e-428e-4d39-bc77-33bea93f35bc.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
8f22297e-428e-4d39-bc77-33bea93f35bc.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

f7720716-79c2-4160-a50e-382003015187.description: Calls forever stop to stop node process

echo

96513af3-c981-42aa-a0fa-b0956c8d7336.description: Adds simple file based persistence. Creates new json file only if it does not exist.

echo 'var:dataStoreFile:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>'

#Create datastore file if it does not exist

setPromptCodes:3e 20

fi

bbf4429d-e3f6-419c-8a47-b92e773d1243.name: Hello World Data Store Get (/helloworldGet)
bbf4429d-e3f6-419c-8a47-b92e773d1243.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

f8291606-2eec-480a-857d-a7ce5cb09e98.name: re/start node
f8291606-2eec-480a-857d-a7ce5cb09e98.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
f8291606-2eec-480a-857d-a7ce5cb09e98.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

ba1314df-e1be-4634-a168-9f53e60e60d1.name: Sample Applications

ops.insert:
Builds and deploys sample applications.
Creates Project Folders.

ba1314df-e1be-4634-a168-9f53e60e60d1.script:
cd ~
pwd
export projectName=<%c.projectName%> 

sudo rm -fr projects/$projectName/
mkdir ./projects/
mkdir projects/$projectName/
cd ./projects/$projectName/

export:projectPath:pwd

echo var:projectName:$projectName

echo var:testingHostPort:<%c.testingProt%><%s.host%>:<%c.testingPort%> 

echo var:systemUser:<%c.user%> 

echo var:hostName:<%c.hostName%>

519ff482-c93f-4406-8718-07de745d24e3.name: Node instance (Server.js)
519ff482-c93f-4406-8718-07de745d24e3.script:
rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
saveTemplate:<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
<%s.waitFor%> <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

export serverPath=<%p.projectPath%>
export serverPathFile=<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

echo var:serverPathFile:$serverPathFile
echo var:nodeFileName:<%c.nodeFileName%>

chmod 660 $serverPathFile

cd $serverPath
#npm install express --save
<%s.npmInstall%> express 

rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/404.html
saveTemplate:2:<%p.projectPath%>/404.html

echo 'var:add_inits:<add_inits>'
echo 'var:add_functions:<add_functions>'

mkdir <%p.projectPath%>/static
echo var:staticPath:<%p.projectPath%>/static

5c516755-6b8a-4070-b61d-c8f830970b67.name: sudo re/start Node
5c516755-6b8a-4070-b61d-c8f830970b67.description:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh
5c516755-6b8a-4070-b61d-c8f830970b67.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%c.server%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
rm -f err.log

nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

4b37ab22-5f6f-454e-b84d-683ff1a37ae6.description: Calls sudo forever stop to stop node process

d32427e1-6617-478f-a30a-1c1e3f572edb.description: Test connection to system and ability to snap

5ffdace1-fbe3-4b6d-b652-1d378b50560f.name: Install letsencrypt SSL Cert

ops.insert:
Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.
https://www.npmjs.com/package/acme-client. 
Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

Change

.

Ensure this server has http port 80 open and publicly reachable via  <%a.hostName%>  and not redirecting when building. 
3 files are generated;
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.key  
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.cert
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.csr 

After the files are generated you can enable https and redirect to https

5ffdace1-fbe3-4b6d-b652-1d378b50560f.script:
<%s.npmInstall%> acme-client

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%staticPath%' <%a.staticPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%hostName%' <%a.hostName%>   <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%systemUser%' <%a.systemUser%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%email%' <%c.email%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%commitment%' <%c.commitment%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

mkdir <%a.staticPath%>/.well-known
mkdir <%a.staticPath%>/.well-known/acme-challenge

mkdir /home/<%a.systemUser%>/.ssl


node <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

e28aa33a-a12c-45c6-ba65-f27399b70ed9.name: http
e28aa33a-a12c-45c6-ba65-f27399b70ed9.description: loads node script with http functions
e28aa33a-a12c-45c6-ba65-f27399b70ed9.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var http = require('http');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

rm -f tmp.txt
saveTemplate:tmp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> tmp.txt
export toReplace='<add_listen>'

<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace tmp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f tmp.txt

export toReplace="portxxxx"
export newline="<%c.port%>"
<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile"

9757d600-dd83-4ac2-9786-2054e6a08a86.name: https

ops.insert:
https://matoski.com/article/node-express-generate-ssl/
 sudo yum install –y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y pwgen
pwgen 50 1 -s > passphrase

openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "/C=US/ST=Denial/L=Springfield/O=Dis/CN=www.example.com" -keyout server.key -out server.crt

9757d600-dd83-4ac2-9786-2054e6a08a86.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var https = require('https');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

# self signed cert/key generation tasks removed in favor of letsencrypt
# mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
# cd <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
# pwd
# openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "<%c.subject%>" -keyout server.key -out server.crt

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new https port
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%port%' <%c.port%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new host name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%hostName%' <%a.hostName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

c20d406f-738d-487b-8ffc-536bbb80f215.name: Home UI
c20d406f-738d-487b-8ffc-536bbb80f215.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>

    <title>ezStack.Systems</title>

    <meta content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0' name='viewport' />

    <!--     Fonts and icons     -->

    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,400,500,700" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/latest/css/font-awesome.min.css" />

    <!-- CSS Files -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Gn5384xqQ1aoWXA+058RXPxPg6fy4IWvTNh0E263XmFcJlSAwiGgFAW/dAiS6JXm" crossorigin="anonymous">
    
    

    <!--boot strap js-->
    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/popper.js/1.12.9/umd/popper.min.js" integrity="sha384-ApNbgh9B+Y1QKtv3Rn7W3mgPxhU9K/ScQsAP7hUibX39j7fakFPskvXusvfa0b4Q" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-JZR6Spejh4U02d8jOt6vLEHfe/JQGiRRSQQxSfFWpi1MquVdAyjUar5+76PVCmYl" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>



    <!-- %insertJsSrc% -->

    <!--%insertCSSSrc%-->

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/clientCSS/%viewName%.css" />

    <style>


    </style>

    <script type = "text/javascript" language = "javascript" >

        $(document).ready(function() {

            $("#navbar-fixed-top").hide();

            $('.scroller').scroll(function(e) {
                //$('.scroller').scrollTop(e.target.scrollTop);
                var scr = e.target.scrollTop;
                if (scr > 250){
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").css('z-index', 1);
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").slideDown("slow");
                }else{
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").css('z-index', -1);
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").slideUp("slow");
                }
            });


            <!--%insertDocReady%-->
        });

    </script>

</head>


<body class="index-page">

<!-- %insertBodyHTML% -->

</body>

<script src="/clientJs/%viewName%.js"></script>	



</html>

3931583a-204c-42c8-919c-d3f5f1c83c0f.name: re/start node
3931583a-204c-42c8-919c-d3f5f1c83c0f.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
3931583a-204c-42c8-919c-d3f5f1c83c0f.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

57f5a9f4-60d5-4e84-888f-6a5cb2fa75d8.name: Get Started (/getstarted)
57f5a9f4-60d5-4e84-888f-6a5cb2fa75d8.script:
echo var:viewName:<%c.viewName%> 
echo var:serviceRoute:<%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile


<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%c.viewName%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' <%c.serviceRoute%> $tempFile

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%> -->' >> $tempFile 

#insert router code into Node script 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' $tempFile <%a.serverPathFile%>

rm -f $tempFile

8ebe309c-08b6-450a-a0e9-b4a53b2fc241.name: Get Started UI
8ebe309c-08b6-450a-a0e9-b4a53b2fc241.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

9183db57-f1c3-4c5f-8374-fd28b068bd21.name: re/start node
9183db57-f1c3-4c5f-8374-fd28b068bd21.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
9183db57-f1c3-4c5f-8374-fd28b068bd21.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

a321449f-2812-4a34-8cdd-0e3c579c23a3.script:
echo var:viewName:<%c.viewName%> 
echo var:serviceRoute:<%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile


<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%c.viewName%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' <%c.serviceRoute%> $tempFile

#insert router code into Node script

rm -f $tempFile

Returns all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. 
Eg: 
http://myNode/componentsGet&id=#

d8a9d4f5-446d-4a55-9849-072b21b6cea7.name: SimpleHTMLTemplate
d8a9d4f5-446d-4a55-9849-072b21b6cea7.description:
html template with jQuery, BS, etc

creates viewsPath/viewName.ejs
d8a9d4f5-446d-4a55-9849-072b21b6cea7.script:
##Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

#create blank custom js file
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath
touch $jsPath
echo '<!-- %customJSInsert% -->' >> $jsPath

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%
echo var:customJSInsert:%customJSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertSrcLink:%insertSrcLink%

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

snap:<%a.testingHostPort%><%a.serviceRoute%>

635b73b4-7b47-439a-b11d-bcffa0a05675.script:

fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

f1069901-d309-4854-89df-17f0fee6b003.name: Contact UI
f1069901-d309-4854-89df-17f0fee6b003.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

9d3339a6-e0a6-4ec1-907e-4cb5e21c6a15.name: re/start node
9d3339a6-e0a6-4ec1-907e-4cb5e21c6a15.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
9d3339a6-e0a6-4ec1-907e-4cb5e21c6a15.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

f59697f0-6579-4b42-a734-e6f77ff728c6.name: FAQ Data Store Get - /faqGet

ops.insert:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

f59697f0-6579-4b42-a734-e6f77ff728c6.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

516addb9-4e66-4bbe-ac76-ceea8e0afcf4.name: FAQ UI
516addb9-4e66-4bbe-ac76-ceea8e0afcf4.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

ef6af9ff-5c25-4e29-bf69-a687a52e9d65.name: re/start node
ef6af9ff-5c25-4e29-bf69-a687a52e9d65.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
ef6af9ff-5c25-4e29-bf69-a687a52e9d65.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

146fd8d5-90aa-4e84-9f16-6dc91b833fd4.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css

touch $cssPath

#create blank custom JS file

export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

4f816d60-0104-4370-b70f-e7aa3a9c2a11.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
4f816d60-0104-4370-b70f-e7aa3a9c2a11.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

e0b9e852-b7b8-4260-ac09-5bf548c54fad.name: sessions
e0b9e852-b7b8-4260-ac09-5bf548c54fad.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 
pwd
<%s.npmInstall%> express-session
<%s.npmInstall%> session-file-store
<%s.npmInstall%> password-hash

#Generate pw hash and create identity json
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/identity/identity.json
rm -f ./setIdentity.js
mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/identity
saveTemplate:3:<%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%password%' '<%c.password%>' <%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
node ./setIdentity.js
rm -r ./setIdentity.js

export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var session = require('express-session');\nvar FileStore = require('session-file-store')(session);\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%secret%' '<%c.secret%>' <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt

ls
export toReplace='<add_app.use>'
<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace temp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt
saveTemplate:2:<%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt
export toReplace='<add_services>'
<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace temp2.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt

adc4f440-79f8-4f88-b9e8-9bf0db5e6398.name: CM Data Store Get (/cmGet)
adc4f440-79f8-4f88-b9e8-9bf0db5e6398.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
adc4f440-79f8-4f88-b9e8-9bf0db5e6398.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

da56e2d5-6a27-45c1-b7de-98fc30de00c0.name: Contact Manager UI
da56e2d5-6a27-45c1-b7de-98fc30de00c0.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

35201a42-52e4-411e-a044-f14daf9ff2b1.script:
#Save js template into doc.ready() function in header of a.servicePathFileName
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert function name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%getRowFunctionName%' <%c.functionName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add doc ready point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertDocReadyJS%> -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert service name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%getRowServiceName%' <%c.DataGetServiceEndPointName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert updated template into doc.ready
<%s.Replace file line with file%> <%a.insertDocReadyJS%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%>  

echo var:getRowFunctionName:<%c.functionName%>

99ddae3e-8d33-4bf3-8cc7-0dd7aa6cedbc.name: FM Data Store Get (/fmGet)
99ddae3e-8d33-4bf3-8cc7-0dd7aa6cedbc.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

f531c2fc-8301-4d89-a719-91bcd8236108.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names

echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%clientCSS%' '/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css'  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css

touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

561d2c40-f55d-4113-b832-8e0c7d9a548b.name: Grid UI
561d2c40-f55d-4113-b832-8e0c7d9a548b.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%


#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

3f7cc382-6cd0-4891-aea0-312ad0655658.name: install headless Chrome
3f7cc382-6cd0-4891-aea0-312ad0655658.description:
Install headless Chrome in EC2 RHEL 7.3 using yum
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/add-repositories.html
https://medium.com/@davidkadlec/installing-google-chrome-on-amazon-linux-ec2-d1cb6aa37f28
https://www.sitepoint.com/headless-chrome-node-js/
3f7cc382-6cd0-4891-aea0-312ad0655658.script:
mkdir ~/tmp
cd ~/tmp
rm -f installChrome.sh
pwd
ls -l
saveTemplate:/home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
<%s.waitFor%> /home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
sudo yum repolist all

chmod 770 ~/tmp/installChrome.sh

./installChrome.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo echo -e "[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/\$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "[CentOS-base]
name=CentOS-6 - Base
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=os
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#released updates
[CentOS-updates]
name=CentOS-6 - Updates
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=updates
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#additional packages that may be useful
[CentOS-extras]
name=CentOS-6 - Extras
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=extras
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6
" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum install -y google-chrome-stable
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum -y install gnu-free-sans-fonts

google-chrome-stable --version

e2f85536-a2f2-427b-9514-53e428df4910.name: npmInstall.sh
e2f85536-a2f2-427b-9514-53e428df4910.description:
Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]
e2f85536-a2f2-427b-9514-53e428df4910.script:
rm -f <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh

while [ ! -f <%p.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh ]
setPromptCodes:3e 20
   do
   sleep 0.1
done
setPrompt:[SysStack]

chmod 770 <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
echo var:npmInstall:npmInstall.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save#!/bin/bash
    sleep 3
  fi
echo done

#!/bin/sh

file=$1

if [ ! -e "$file" ] ; then

    echo $2 >> $file
fi

if [ ! -w "$file" ] ; then
    echo cannot write to $file
    exit 1
fi

1237c4ba-4f9d-4dcf-b118-2b7f533d5029.name: Create AWS Security Group (builder-demo-group)
1237c4ba-4f9d-4dcf-b118-2b7f533d5029.description:
Creates an AWS security group called builder-demo-group.
Provided access to builder (this) server and to user.
Adds ingress rules:
